segment.source: Administering UE-V 2.x
segment.target: Administering UE-V 2.x

segment.source: Administering UE-V 2.x
segment.target: Administering UE-V 2.x

segment.source: Administering UE-V 2.x
segment.target: Administering UE-V 2.x

segment.source: After you have deployed Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 2.0, 2.1, or 2.1 SP1, you must be able to perform various ongoing administrative tasks, such as managing the configuration of the UE-V Agent and recovering lost settings.
segment.target: After you have deployed Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 2.0, 2.1, or 2.1 SP1, you must be able to perform various ongoing administrative tasks, such as managing the configuration of the UE-V Agent and recovering lost settings.

segment.source: These post-installation tasks are described in the following sections.
segment.target: These post-installation tasks are described in the following sections.

segment.source: Managing UE-V 2.x configurations
segment.target: Managing UE-V 2.x configurations

segment.source: In the course of the UE-V lifecycle, you have to manage the configuration of the UE-V Agent and also manage storage locations for resources such as settings package files.
segment.target: In the course of the UE-V lifecycle, you have to manage the configuration of the UE-V Agent and also manage storage locations for resources such as settings package files.

segment.source: Manage Configurations for UE-V 2.x
segment.target: Manage Configurations for UE-V 2.x

segment.source: Working with custom UE-V templates and the UE-V 2.x Generator
segment.target: Working with custom UE-V templates and the UE-V 2.x Generator

segment.source: This topic provides instructions for how to use the UE-V Generator and manage custom settings location templates.
segment.target: This topic provides instructions for how to use the UE-V Generator and manage custom settings location templates.

segment.source: Working with Custom UE-V 2.x Templates and the UE-V 2.x Generator
segment.target: Working with Custom UE-V 2.x Templates and the UE-V 2.x Generator

segment.source: Backup and restore application and Windows settings that are synchronized with UE-V 2.x
segment.target: Backup and restore application and Windows settings that are synchronized with UE-V 2.x

segment.source: Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) and Windows PowerShell features of UE-V provide the ability to restore settings packages.
segment.target: Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) and Windows PowerShell features of UE-V provide the ability to restore settings packages.

segment.source: By using WMI and Windows PowerShell commands, you can restore application and Windows settings to their original state and restore additional settings when a user adopts a new device.
segment.target: By using WMI and Windows PowerShell commands, you can restore application and Windows settings to their original state and restore additional settings when a user adopts a new device.

segment.source: Manage Administrative Backup and Restore in UE-V 2.x
segment.target: Manage Administrative Backup and Restore in UE-V 2.x

segment.source: Changing the frequency of UE-V 2.x scheduled tasks
segment.target: Changing the frequency of UE-V 2.x scheduled tasks

segment.source: You can configure the scheduled tasks that manage when UE-V checks for new or updated settings or for updated custom settings location templates in the settings template catalog.
segment.target: You can configure the scheduled tasks that manage when UE-V checks for new or updated settings or for updated custom settings location templates in the settings template catalog.

segment.source: Changing the Frequency of UE-V 2.x Scheduled Tasks
segment.target: Changing the Frequency of UE-V 2.x Scheduled Tasks

segment.source: Migrating UE-V 2.x settings packages
segment.target: Migrating UE-V 2.x settings packages

segment.source: You can relocate the user settings packages either when they migrate to a new server or for backup purposes.
segment.target: You can relocate the user settings packages either when they migrate to a new server or for backup purposes.

segment.source: Migrating UE-V 2.x Settings Packages
segment.target: Migrating UE-V 2.x Settings Packages

segment.source: Using UE-V 2.x with Application Virtualization applications
segment.target: Using UE-V 2.x with Application Virtualization applications

segment.source: You can use UE-V with Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) to share settings between virtual applications and installed applications across multiple computers.
segment.target: You can use UE-V with Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) to share settings between virtual applications and installed applications across multiple computers.

segment.source: Using UE-V 2.x with Application Virtualization Applications
segment.target: Using UE-V 2.x with Application Virtualization Applications
